Package elements

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
elements.Camera
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
Camera class represents the location and the direction of the camera that watch the scene, and the dimensions of view plane the scene is watched through

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private double _distance
    distance from the camera to the view plane

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      public Camera​(Point3D p0, Vector vTo, Vector vUp)
      Camera constructor
      Parameters:
      p0 - location of the camera
      vTo - normal vector to the view plane
      vUp - vector that orthogonal to vTo and points up from p0

  • Method Details

    • get_p0

    • setViewPlaneSize

      public Camera setViewPlaneSize​(double width, double height)
      setter to the view plane width and length (chaining method)
      Parameters:
      width - width of the view plane
      height - length of the view plane
      Returns:
      current Camera instance

    • setDistance

      public Camera setDistance​(double distance)
      setter to distance (chaining method)
      Parameters:
      distance - distance from the camera to the view plane
      Returns:
      current Camera instance

    • constructRayThroughPixel

      public Ray constructRayThroughPixel​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      find ray that starts at p0 and go through the center of specific pixel in the view plane
      Parameters:
      nX - view plane's pixels number in x axis (columns)
      nY - view plane's pixels number in Y axis (rows)
      j - pixel's column index
      i - pixel's row index
      Returns:
      reference to Ray representing a ray that starts at p0 go through the center of the pixel
